news.title: Major updates and a new name

content.content:
Story Mapping for Jira - Pro is now Advanced Story Maps for Jira! 

We have added a significant new feature to this release: Dynamic maps.
You can now load any agile board and manage epics, stories, tasks, and their issue links on the fly, and all changes will now reflect 100% into the agile board. Additionally, managing the app configuration has gotten much easier - use the new hierarchy button in the top right-hand corner to modify the map's issue hierarchy and link types. The changes will appear instantly in the map view.
We have made the Pro Version available free for up to 10 users. Check it out on the marketplace!

items: The top bar has been re-arranged to give you more vertical space for the story map
Issues now open in a modal dialog and can be modified on the fly.
Fixed a bug that prevented maps from loading when an invalid quick filter was active
Our most requested feature is here: You can now manage multiple user story maps in one project.

Introducing epic statistics: See the progress of your issues within an epic. Toggle between
totals per status, percentage of issues per status completed or percentage of story points done.
Sub-task support: You can now display the number of subtasks on the issue card, alongside a link that reveals all subtasks and their status
